name: @refinio/one.projfs
description: Windows Projected File System (ProjFS) native addon for Node.js

scripts.clean:test: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); try { fs.rmSync('C:/Temp/refinio-api-server-instance', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.rmSync('C:/Temp/refinio-api-client-instance', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.rmSync('C:/OneFiler-Test', { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Test directories cleaned'); } catch(e) { console.log('Cleanup complete (some dirs may not exist)'); }"

author: REFINIO GmbH
